column2: Mid-America Apartment Communities, Inc. is a real estate investment trust. The company is headquartered in Germantown, Tennessee and currently employs 2,508 full-time employees. The firm owns, operates, acquires and develops apartment communities primarily located in the Southeast and Southwest regions of the United States. The company operates through three segments: Large market same store, Secondary market same store and Non-Same Store and Other. Its Large market same store communities are communities in markets with a population of at least one million and at least 1% of the total public multifamily REIT units that it has owned. Its Secondary market same store communities are communities in markets with populations of more than one million but less than 1% of the total public multifamily REIT units or markets with populations of less than one million that it has owned. Its Non-same store communities and other includes recent acquisitions and communities in development or lease-up communities.
